title: Cant connect to any game (EU nord east)
body:
Greetings, 

today i cant connect to any game , i tried even custom game (me vs bot) but right when the loading screen should pop up nothing, black screen and i have to restart the PC (because i cant even ALT+TAB to windows)

yesterday everything was fine

David

replies.body: The black screen suggests that you're having a connection problem failing to connect to the game server, further affirmed by not being able to get in-game.  It sounds like the failure to transition is causing your PC to idle, and you could have issues multitasking/tabbing depending on your pc's processing power..  You should go over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up.  I hope that helps!
